howItWorks.title: Your Path to Healthier Habits in 3 Simple Steps
howItWorks.subtitle: Start understanding your patterns and changing your relationship with food

step1.title: Share Your Day
step1.description: Have a natural conversation with your AI guide about your emotions, cravings, and situations that lead to eating. No complicated forms—just an honest and friendly chat.

step2.title: Discover Your Patterns
step2.description: The AI analyzes your messages and identifies what really drives your habits. Spot triggers you may not have noticed and understand why you eat the way you do.

step3.title: Build New Habits with Daily Challenges
step3.description: Receive personalized daily challenges based on your patterns. Complete them, track your progress, and watch your relationship with food gradually transform.

features.title: Tools to Help You Understand Yourself and Change
features.subtitle: Everything you need to build lasting habits in a personal and supportive way

feature1.title: Understand What Drives Your Decisions
feature1.description: Your AI guide detects patterns you may have missed. Finally understand what triggers your cravings and when you're most vulnerable, so you can make conscious choices in the moment.

feature2.title: Get Challenges That Actually Work for You
feature2.description: Forget generic advice. Each day you'll receive 5 challenges tailored to your habits and emotions, designed to help you break unhelpful patterns and strengthen the ones that serve you.

feature3.title: Track Your Progress and Celebrate Wins
feature3.description: See how you're improving day by day. Review past conversations and celebrate every small victory. Each step counts toward a healthier relationship with food.

feature4.title: Personalized Guidance Just for You
feature4.description: No generic recommendations here. Your AI guide offers advice based on what's really happening in your life, tailored to your patterns and needs.

feature5.title: Understand the Reason Behind Every Challenge
feature5.description: Each challenge has a purpose linked to your habits. Connect the dots between your patterns and your goals, making every action meaningful.

feature6.title: Your Information Stays Private

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before getting started

question1.q: Are my data safe and private?
question1.a: Absolutely. Everything you share is encrypted with the same security banks use. Your conversations are completely private and will never be sold or shared with third parties. What you share with the AI stays with the AI.

question2.q: How does this really help me change?
question2.a: Think of it as having a very attentive friend who notices patterns you can't see. The AI analyzes your daily conversations, identifies what drives your eating habits, and gives you personalized challenges to create real change.

question3.a: EmotionEat offers flexible plans to suit your needs. You can explore all features and choose the plan that fits you best directly in the app.

question4.q: I'm not good at writing journals. Will this work for me?
question4.a: Don't worry! This isn't a traditional journal. It's like chatting with a friend about your day: just share what happened, how you felt, and what you ate. The AI asks helpful questions to guide the conversation, without pressure or blank pages.

question5.a: EmotionEat gives you everything you need: daily chats with the AI to track your eating patterns, personalized challenges based on your habits, unlimited advice tailored to your journey, and full progress tracking to see how far you've come.

question6.a: No, and we are clear about that. EmotionEat helps you understand your patterns and build better habits, but it is not a therapist. If you have a serious eating disorder, please consult a qualified professional. We are here to support your journey, not replace professional care.
